text: National Sun Yat-sen University (NSYSU) is a university in Taiwan, named in honor of Dr. Sun Yat-sen, the founding father of the Republic of China. The main campus is in Kaohsiung City. It was founded in 1980. NSYSU is among the four universities of the Taiwan Comprehensive University System. ==Other websites== * NSYSU * Introduce to NSYSU (2018) * Study in Taiwan NSYSU * NSYSU Reviews - Kaohsiung, Taiwan Attractions - TripAdvisor S Category:1980 establishments in Asia Category:1980s establishments in Taiwan
title: National Sun Yat-sen University
